studyAmendmentImpacts.description: Addition of Week 3 visit header and associated footnote.

studyAmendmentImpacts.affectedSection: Section 10.6 - Appendix 6: Liver and other safety
studyAmendmentImpacts.description: Incorporation of liver function test monitoring guidance previously held in the study manual.
Updates to co-medication guidance and metabolic interaction references.
New section for US, Brazil, and Israel regarding FDA partial clinical hold conditions and prohibited inhibitors.
Reformatting, editorial changes, and updates to table of contents and abbreviations.

studyAmendmentReasons.reasonText: Include liver function test monitoring guidance previously in the study manual
Update co-medication guidance as per Health Authority request
Correction of error regarding modafinil classification as a weak rather than moderate CYP3A inducer
Updated guidance for CYP inhibitors/inducers based on information from DDI study

studyChanges.afterText: Week 3 added in the visit header and in footnote ‘l’
studyChanges.summary: Added Week 3 visit to the Schedule of Activities.

studyChanges.afterText: Recommendation for the sites to refer to the drug label for metabolic interactions
studyChanges.summary: Removed external website reference for drug interactions.

studyChanges.beforeText: modafinil in the list of moderate CYP3A inducers
studyChanges.summary: Removed modafinil from prohibited list as it is a weak inducer.

studyChanges.beforeText: rifabutin in the list of potent CYP3A inducers
studyChanges.afterText: rifabutin moved to the list of moderate CYP3A inducers
studyChanges.summary: Reclassified rifabutin based on DDI study data.

studyChanges.afterText: Prohibited use of CYP3A and CYP2C8 inhibitors and restriction of grapefruit/grapefruit juice
studyChanges.summary: Added specific restrictions for sites following FDA partial clinical hold.
